articles.author: Bloomberg News
articles.title: Pfizer Covid Pill Hits Shares of Asian Covid Vaccine Makers - BNN
articles.description: Makers of Covid-19 vaccines and treatments slumped in Asia after Pfizer Inc. published a positive result from its Covid-19 pill, which it said reduced hospitalizations and deaths in high-risk patients by 89%.
articles.content: (Bloomberg) -- Makers of Covid-19 vaccines and treatments slumped in Asia after Pfizer Inc. published a positive result from its Covid-19 pill, which it said reduced hospitalizations and deaths in hi… [+1420 chars]

articles.title: Man in Brazil dies after jumping into piranha-infested lake to escape swarm of bees - AsiaOne
articles.description: A man in Brazil reportedly died after jumping into a lake to escape a swarm of bees, only to be partially devoured by flesh-eating piranhas. His mangled body was found last Sunday (Oct 31), although it was initially unclear if he had died by drowning before b…
articles.content:
A man in Brazil reportedly died after jumping into a lake to escape a swarm of bees, only to be partially devoured by flesh-eating piranhas.
His mangled body was found last Sunday (Oct 31), although… [+1450 chars]

articles.title: 'Felt like a riot': Fan stampede at Travis Scott's Astroworld concert leaves 8 dead and more injured - AsiaOne
articles.description: HOUSTON — A stampede of fans surging toward the stage during rap star Travis Scott's Astroworld music festival in Houston killed at least eight people and injured dozens more as panic rippled through the crowd of largely young concertgoers, officials said on …
